thread.title: Techno teachers: Finnish school trials robot educators

title: Techno teachers: Finnish school trials robot educators
text:
Techno teachers: Finnish school trials robot educators Tuesday, March 27, 2018 - 01:35 
Elias, the new language teacher in a school in southern Finland, has endless patience for repetition, never makes a pupil feel embarrassed for asking a question and can even do the ''Gangnam Style,''
